thread.title: AA Vacations Rewards Travel Agents For Their Labor This Labor Day
thread.title_full: AA Vacations Rewards Travel Agents For Their Labor This Labor Day

title: AA Vacations Rewards Travel Agents For Their Labor This Labor Day
text:
Last updated: 02:12 PM ET, Sat September 05 2015 AA Vacations Rewards Travel Agents For Their Labor This Labor Day Travel Agent | American Airlines Vacations | September 05, 2015 
American Airlines Vacations is commemorating Labor Day by rewarding its important travel agent partners with extra commission — up to 19 percent. From September 7-19, travel agents booking AA Vacations packages will receive 19 percent commission (4 percent bonus) for all Curacao hotels; 17 percent commission (2 percent bonus) for all Caribbean/Mexico/Hawaii preferred hotels and 12 percent commission (2 percent bonus) for domestic preferred hotels. 
“We know being a professional travel agent is hard work, and we appreciate the efforts of this dedicated workforce,” said Michael Schmeltzer, President, American Airlines Vacations. “We are committed to this community — that’s why we continue to reach out to them, incorporating their feedback into our products.
